actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow any State an additional year in which to repay advances made before January 1, 1974, to the unemployment account of such State under title XII of the Social Security Act.

summary.text: Allows any State an additional year in which to repay advances made before January 1, 1974, to the unemployment account of such State under title XII of the Social Security Act (advances to State unemployment funds).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow any State an additional year in which to repay advances made before January 1, 1974, to the unemployment account of such State under title XII of the Social Security Act.
